text: Fort Benton is a city in Montana in the United States. It is the county seat of Chouteau County. As of the 2020 United States Census, there were 1,449 people. Established in 1846, Fort Benton is the oldest settlement in Montana. The Missouri River flows along the town. ==References== Category:Cities in Montana Category:County seats in Montana Category:19th-century establishments in Montana Category:1846 establishments in the United States
title: Fort Benton, Montana
